creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: alternating vertical and horizontal 1" strips in wide center section; dark blue/light blue; bordered by 1-1/4" blue/light blue stripe; further bordered by 4-3/4" magenta band--3 times on each side; open weave; center section has 12 supplimentary weft patterning in green, blue, yellow; both ends are self fringed; at one end, 6" portion is blue and white
dimension:
73 x 44 3/4 in. (185.42 x 113.67 cm) (including fringe)
2 1/2 in. (6.35 cm) (fringe)
title: Wrapper
